text: Narratology is the study of structure in narratives. The theory of narrative or narratology was developed in the 1960s.http://www.lhn.uni- hamburg.de/article/narratology section 3.3 French Structuralism: 1966â€“1980 Narratology is based on the idea of a common literary language. Narratives are found and told through oral and written language. Narratology has helped to make it easier to understand the how and why of narrative. ==References== ==Other websites== *http://wikis.sub.uni-hamburg.de/lhn/index.php/Main_Page - The Living Handbook of Narratology *http://www.units.miamioh.edu/technologyandhumanities/narratology.htm - Notes on Narratology *http://www.nou-la.org/ling/1975a-theonarreme.pdf - THBORIE DES NARRGMES ET ALGORITHMES NARRATIFS Category:Narratology
title: Narratology
